topics.body:
This is going to be a somewhat odd request, but here we go:
I have a couple of shows that I'm in the process of watching right now, but I'm already looking for something to replace them once I finish. In particular, there's a show I've already had my eye on for a little while now: Wakfu.
Yeah.
I don't know anything about the MMO that spawned it (nor do I really have much interest in playing it), but the show caught my attention a while ago, though it's only now that I've really considered watching. So for anyone who _has_ seen it, I want to ask how it is. And if possible, where I can watch it.
